main event: A brilliant green spherical object with orange and red tail markers was observed traveling at a high rate of speed in Falls Church, VA.
interesting points: The object had a diameter and length about three times its diameter., The observer noted that it traveled on an erratic course., The sighting lasted for 30 seconds during darkness., Weather conditions were clear at the time of observation., The observer stated that the object did not resemble a meteor or meteorite.
sighted object: brilliant green spherical object with orange and red tail markers
